'''Long Night's Oath''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities. It is obtained from [[Derelict Masonry Dock]].

== Gameplay Notes ==

* 4-Piece Bonus:
** Plunging Attacks, Charged Attacks and Elemental Skills can gain stacks multiple ways, meaning it is possible to gain maximum stacks without doing all 3 actions.
